notes.title: Sprint Planning Meeting
notes.description: Reviewed backlog items for the upcoming sprint, estimated story points, and assigned tasks to team members. Agreed to prioritize bug fixes before starting new feature development.

notes.title: Daily Routine Improvements
notes.description: Plan to wake up earlier, reduce screen time before bed, and add at least 20 minutes of reading each day. Focus on consistency rather than perfection.

notes.title: React Notes
notes.description: Studied React fundamentals including components, props, state, and hooks. Need to practice useEffect more and understand dependency arrays better.

notes.title: Notes App Features
notes.description: Possible features include search, filtering by category, dark mode, localStorage persistence, and markdown support for descriptions.

notes.title: Workout Plan
notes.description: Workout at least four times a week focusing on strength training and light cardio. Track progress weekly and adjust intensity as needed.
